reviews.review: This is the best game i ever play in team and it will never die

It is nicest game for me. There are fascinating maps and and the overall design of the game. Also there are variety of skins for weapons and your person. But there are some disadvantages. Firstly, it is rank assignment algorithms. As for me, the algorithms work really strangely. Secondly, this game has addictive. But I like the game and advise you to.
Play game. Win matches. Get rank up. Lose 3 games, because Valve put you up against way better players than you are, with silver teammates. Derank. 05 don't play.

Game with a lot of depth and you can easily play for years without mastering it. Also not very taxing on hardware and quite easy to understand. Very polished and fair gameplay that is very fun to try to get better at. But you'll still suck forever
